SpellsData.name: Dew Sparkle
SpellsData.description: Creates a small, illuminating light.

SpellsData.name: Seed Whisper
SpellsData.description: Allows brief communication with plants.

SpellsData.name: Peel Patch
SpellsData.description: Provides minor healing.

SpellsData.name: Zesty Zephyr
SpellsData.description: Manipulates gentle winds.

SpellsData.name: Berry Burst
SpellsData.description: Causes a small explosion of berries, damaging nearby targets.

SpellsData.name: Vine Grasp
SpellsData.description: Entangles a target with fast-growing vines.

SpellsData.name: Juice Bolt
SpellsData.description: Fires a concentrated bolt of juice energy at a target.

SpellsData.name: Citrus Shield
SpellsData.description: Creates a protective barrier with a citrusy scent.

SpellsData.name: Fruit Frenzy
SpellsData.description: Induces confusion in enemies within a small area.

SpellsData.name: Thorn Barricade
SpellsData.description: Creates a barrier of sharp thorns.

SpellsData.name: Pulp Wave
SpellsData.description: Generates a wave of pulpy energy, pushing back enemies.

SpellsData.name: Acidic Spray
SpellsData.description: Sprays a cone of acidic juice, causing damage.

SpellsData.name: Blossom Blizzard
SpellsData.description: Summons a storm of blossoms, damaging and slowing enemies.

SpellsData.name: Rooted Fortress
SpellsData.description: Creates a strong protective barrier from roots.

SpellsData.name: Healing Nectar
SpellsData.description: Releases a burst of nectar that heals allies.

SpellsData.name: Zest Lightning
SpellsData.description: Strikes a target with a dice_rollful bolt of sour energy.

SpellsData.name: Fruitful Bounty
SpellsData.description: Enhances growth in an area, healing and nourishing.

SpellsData.name: Branch Lattice
SpellsData.description: Creates a lattice of branches to imprison or form a barrier.

SpellsData.name: Juice Tsunami
SpellsData.description: Unleashes a massive wave of juice, causing damage and knockback.

SpellsData.name: Sour Storm
SpellsData.description: Summons a storm of sour energy, damaging and debuffing enemies.

SpellsData.name: Orchard's Wrath
SpellsData.description: Summons nature spirits to aid in battle.

SpellsData.name: Timber Crash
SpellsData.description: Causes trees to fall, creating obstacles and damaging enemies.

SpellsData.name: Revitalizing Rain
SpellsData.description: Summons a healing rain that rejuvenates allies.

SpellsData.name: Citrus Cyclone
SpellsData.description: Creates a massive cyclone of citrus energy, causing widespread damage.

SpellsData.name: Vine Labyrinth
SpellsData.description: Creates a complex maze of vines.

SpellsData.name: Grove Guardian
SpellsData.description: Summons a dice_rollful nature spirit to protect an area.

SpellsData.name: Nectar Deluge
SpellsData.description: Floods an area with healing nectar.

SpellsData.name: Acid Rainstorm
SpellsData.description: Summons a storm of acidic rain, causing widespread damage.

SpellsData.name: Bountiful Harvest
SpellsData.description: Instantly grows and harvests crops, providing sustenance.

SpellsData.name: Entangling Grove
SpellsData.description: Transforms an area into a grove that entangles and hinders enemies.

SpellsData.name: Juicy Resurgence
SpellsData.description: Revives and fully heals fallen allies in an area.

SpellsData.name: Sour Shockwave
SpellsData.description: Unleashes a devastating shockwave of sour energy.

SpellsData.name: Orchard Oasis
SpellsData.description: Creates a large, nourishing oasis that heals and rejuvenates.

SpellsData.name: Thorn Tempest
SpellsData.description: Summons a tempest of thorns, causing massive damage and control.

SpellsData.name: Fruitful Mirage
SpellsData.description: Creates a large illusory area that can hide or confuse.

SpellsData.name: Citrus Vortex
SpellsData.description: Creates a dice_rollful vortex of sour energy, pulling and damaging enemies.

SpellsData.name: Eternal Orchard
SpellsData.description: Summons a mystical orchard that provides endless sustenance and healing.

SpellsData.name: Nature's Cataclysm
SpellsData.description: Unleashes a cataclysmic force of nature, causing extreme damage and control.

SpellsData.name: Juice Monsoon
SpellsData.description: Creates a monsoon of rejuvenating juice, healing and cleansing a vast area.

SpellsData.name: Sour Apocalypse
SpellsData.description: Unleashes a devastating sour energy blast, affecting a large area.
